amount_msat.description: in millisatoshi precision; it can be a whole number, or a whole number with suffix *msat* or *sat*, or a three decimal point number with suffix  *sat*, or an 1 to 11 decimal point number suffixed by *btc*

maxfee.description: limits how much is paid fees and it is measured in millisatoshi by default, but also in this case the unit can be specified with a suffix: *msat*, *sat* or *btc*. The default value is 5 sats or 0.5% whichever is higher

maxdelay.description: overrides the value of `max-locktime-blocks` for this payment. It serves to limit the locktime of funds in the payment HTLC measured in blocks

retry_for.description: measured in seconds (default: 60) specifies how much time it is allowed for the command to keep retrying the payment

description.description: only required for bolt11 invoices which do not contain a description themselves, but contain a description hash: in this case *description* is required. *description* is then checked against the hash inside the invoice before it will be paid

label.description: used to attach a label to payments, and is returned in lightning-listpays(7) and lightning-listsendpays(7)
